Tan
Hoa
Dong,
Q.
Binh
Tan,
Tp.
HCM
CHAU HUY AN
FRONT-END DEVELOPER
2009 - 2013
Bachelor of Information Technology
Ton Duc Thang University
Education Education    
HTML / HTML5
CSS / CSS3 / SASS / Responsive
Bootstrap / Materializecss framework
Javascript / jQuery
MongoDB
AngularJS
ReactJS
PHP/ Laravel (working with API)
Wordpress CMS (with WooCommerce)
Photoshop / Illustrator
GIT / SVN repository
Skills Skills    
When I was a kid, I wanted to learn how to play the piano. My dream was to become a pianist, but I did not
have a chance to do that. Instead, I started playing with the computer keyboard, and somehow it became
my new interest.
Passion for coding
Passion for coding    
06/2016 - Present
Team Leader at Alive Vietnam
Alive Vietnam
Alive Vietnam is an IT Japanese company working in both design and development for clients from Japan
and Vietnam. As a team leader, not just have to manage people, tasks. I also need to understand their
advantages, disadvantages, and work with them in the project. 
Duties as a team leader:
Deliver tasks to team member.
Quality control of source code.
Problems, issues solving.
Training Junior developer.
Support Manager.
Duties as a developer: 
Convert from design to template pages.
Ensure quality of product.
Ensure cross browsers compatibility.
Problems, issues solving.
Work History
Work History    
03/2014 - 05/2016
06/2013 - 02/2014
Front-end Developer at Uniweb
Uniweb
Uniweb is an outsource company that deliver excellent websites to the clients in French, US and Canada.
Duties: 
Develop websites, applications using Wordpress, AngularJs, Ionic framework.
Building Email templates.
Convert from design to template pages.
Ensure cross browsers compatibility.
Problems, issues solving.
Some websites have delivered to clients:
boulevardsaintlaurent.com socialwork.columbia.edu aventure-aventure.com normandiebooking.com pixelshirt.fr vizili.com https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sosdispos.app https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/sosdispos/id687620958
Web Developer at Delishop
Delishop
The company is about selling organic dry foods and beverages come from VietNam. 
Duties:
In charge of developing the main website and management site with using Wordpress CMS and
Woocommerce.
Good at researching and learning.
Good at finding solutions.
Ability to work independently / team.
Able to make conversation with foreign people
Fast thinking.
Competencies Competencies    
Referencer Referencer

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
